Sentencas: An overview is given on the present state of development of fuel cells based on solid oxygen ion conductors.
Titulo: Overview on Grain-Boundary and Transport Problems in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The performance is compared to other types of fuel cells.
Titulo: Overview on Grain-Boundary and Transport Problems in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The employed electrolyte and electrode materials and current problems are described.
Titulo: Overview on Grain-Boundary and Transport Problems in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The possibilities of reduced temperature and the reduction of internal resistances is discussed.
Titulo: Overview on Grain-Boundary and Transport Problems in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
